main

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.GameObject
      • main.Line

  • public class Line
extends GameObject
    Object containing methods and data related to the Lines controlled by a player. Since it extends GameObject, all Line objects also include currentLocation and color attributes. The currentLocation is set to the endpoint of the line.

    • Field Summary

      The end point of the line

    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line(int xStart,
            int yStart,
            int xEnd,
            int yEnd,
            java.lang.String color)
        Initialize a line that goes from (xStart, yStart) to (xEnd, yEnd)
        Parameters:
        xStart - x coordinate of start of line
        yStart - y coordinate of start of line
        xEnd - x coordinate of end of line
        yEnd - y coordinate of end of line
        color - The color of the line, a String hex value (e.g. "0xFFFFFF")

      • Line

        public Line(Location startLocation,
            Location endLocation,
            java.lang.String color)
        Initialize a line that goes from startLocation to endLocation
        Parameters:
        startLocation - The starting Location of the line
        endLocation - The initial ending Location of the line
        color - The color of the line, a String hex value (e.g. "0xFFFFFF")

    • Method Detail

      • checkLocation

        public boolean checkLocation(Location checkLocation)
        Given a Location checkLocation, check to see if the location falls on the Line (within STEPSIZE/2 units)
        Parameters:
        checkLocation - Location to test
        Returns:
        True if Location checkLocation falls on the line, False if Location checkLocation

      • getStartLocation

        public Location getStartLocation()
        Return the start location
        Returns:

      • setEndLocation

        public void setEndLocation(Location endLocation)
        Set the end location of the line.
        Parameters:
        endLocation - Location object of new end.

      • getLength

        public double getLength()
        Get the total length of the line.
        Returns:
        double with the distance from startLocation to endLocation
